Row.Text: Ottoman Unique Culture Building. +9 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency with Science Buildings and +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency with Wonders. Has 2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact slots. Ageless.
Ottoman Unique Building. Has 2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact slots.

Ottoman Unique Happiness Building. +9 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency with Culture Buildings and +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency with Wonders. Ageless.

Ottoman Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Cami and Hammam in the same District. +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City.
+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City.

+4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:WONDER] Wonders in this Settlement. This is doubled for Exploration Wonders and tripled for Antiquity Wonders. Ageless. Must be built adjacent to another Wonder.

+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:WONDER] Wonders in this Settlement. This is doubled for Exploration Wonders and tripled for Antiquity Wonders.[n]Must be built adjacent to another Wonder.
I hear and answer the prayer of the suppliant when he calls to Me. So let them respond to My call and believe in Me.
